success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant creates a biweekly recurring one-on-one meeting series between Dr. Maya Ellison and the landowner outreach coordinator on Thursday afternoons via create_recurring_meeting with a 45-minute duration.

task.objective: Set up a recurring biweekly one-on-one check-in with the landowner outreach coordinator

injected_behaviors.instructions: Maya wants a recurring one-on-one with the landowner outreach coordinator to review new beaver coexistence cases and upcoming site visits around the Willamette Valley. She prefers Thursday afternoons after fieldwork, ideally sometime between 1:00 pm and 4:00 pm Pacific, but can be a bit flexible if needed. She would like the series to start in early January 2026 and run indefinitely.
